thread.title: BRIEF-Hotel Majestic Cannes FY operating income down at 19.1 million euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hotel Majestic Cannes FY operating income down at 19.1 million euros
text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) - Societe Immobiliere Et dâ€˜Exploitation Hotel Majestic SA:
* FY REVENUE 68.1 MILLION EUROS VS 68.8 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* FY OPERATING INCOME 19.1 MILLION EUROS VS 22.6 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* FY NET INCOME 13.8 MILLION EUROS VS 15.1 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
